attributes.action: Bring back Bake Off to the BBC
attributes.background: We feel that the most popular show watched by BBC license fee payers should have been protected from poaching and bought back to the BBC.

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of the UK Government and there is no provision for the UK Government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.

You might like to write to the BBC to make this suggestion.
